channel.title: Diary of a developer | Alexander Baikalov
channel.description: A blog related to my personal projects and my journey as a developer

item.title: GPT-4 WILL affect YOUR JOB - new study released
item.description: OpenAI has recently created GPT-4, a new language model that shows promising improvements over its predecessor, GPT-3.5. In this blog post, we'll explore some of the features and capabilities of GPT-4 and discuss how it might impact the future of AI and human collaboration.
item.author: alexander.baikalov@inslapineda.cat (Aleksandr Baikálov)
